{"step_by_step_thinking": "AIDS was first clinically observed in 1981 in the United States, but the causative agent, HIV, was not identified until later. It was not in 1976 or 1969 because these years are before the first clinical observation of AIDS. It was also not in 1994 because this is too late. The causative agent of AIDS, HIV, was discovered in 1983.", "answer_choice": "B"}
